name: Tether (itch) (Amar Kinstan)
description:
Why Tether?

Tether is an abstract arcade platformer about elastic connections and arcing flights. Attach your tether, then swing into the beyond. How long can you go without colliding in this procedurally generated world?

Features
  • Infinite worlds to swing through
  • Original music to swing to
  • Global leaderboard
  • Dark mode for night time swinging

Tether will eventually be released on Steam, but will be hosted here until feature complete.

How to play

In Tether you score points based on your speed and direction. Graceful upward motion gets the most points, while staying still or falling gets the least. For a more zen experience you can turn off the scoring.

Controls
  • Left mouse click - Attach tether
  • Left mouse hold - Draw tether in
  • Right mouse click - Detach tether
Credits

Created by Amar Kinstan
Fantastic music by Jonathan Oakley
Additional code by Matthew Rundle
